Room.Name: Boar's Arse Pub
Room.ShortDescription: You are in one of the larger pubs located in the City of Hafnia.
Room.LongDescription: A lot of different races seem to enjoy this pub. You are in the main tap room, and can see the pub also has a dining room in a separate part of the building. An oaken stairway on the south side of the room goes to an upstairs section. Looks like a couple of bouncers or guards are at the bottom of the stairs. Something interesting is up there, no doubt.
